languages.text: {n}Лицо Торбальда омрачается.{/n} "Немного было в моем сердце любви к Оптикону-22, но с Криком скверны бился он достойно и пал отважно. Достойный был муж, надо сквитаться за него!"

{n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Doomscream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"
languages.original_text: {n}Лицо Торбальда омрачается.{/n} "Немного было в моем сердце любви к Оптикону-22, но с Криком скверны бился он достойно и пал отважно. Достойный был муж, надо сквитаться за него!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Balescream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: {n}索巴德的脸色变得阴沉起来。{/n}“我原本对奥普蒂孔22号没有多少敬意，但他光荣地与灾啸战斗，在战斗中英勇牺牲。他是位值得尊敬的战士，杀害他的人必须付出鲜血的代价！”
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Doomscream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"

traits.locale_text: {n}索巴德的脸色变得阴沉起来。{/n}“我原本对奥普蒂孔22号没有多少敬意，但他光荣地与灾啸战斗，在战斗中英勇牺牲。他是位值得尊敬的战士，杀害他的人必须付出血的代价！”
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Thorbald s'assombrit.{/n} « Je n'avais guère de respect pour Opticon-22, mais il a combattu le Fléau Hurlant avec honneur et donné sa vie avec courage. C'était un fier guerrier. Son meurtrier doit payer ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Doomscream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Thorbald s'assombrit.{/n} « Je n'avais guère de respect pour Opticon-22, mais il a combattu le Fléau Hurlant avec honneur et donné sa vie avec courage. C'était un fier guerrier. Son meurtrier doit payer ! »
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: {n}トールバルドの表情が暗くなる。{/n}「俺はオプティコン-22をほとんど尊敬していなかったが、彼はドゥームスクリームと名誉ある戦いをし、勇気をもって倒れた。立派な戦士だった。彼を殺した者は同じように血祭りにあげられるべきだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Doomscream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"

traits.locale_text: {n}トールバルドの表情が暗くなる。{/n}「俺はオプティコン-22をほとんど尊敬していなかったが、彼はドゥームスクリームと名誉ある戦いをし、勇気をもって倒れた。立派な戦士だった。彼を殺した者は同じように血祭りにあげられるべきだ！」
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Thorbald se oscurece.{/n} «No respetaba demasiado a Opticon-22, pero luchó honorablemente contra Doomscream y murió valientemente. Era un guerrero digno. ¡Y quien lo ha matado deberá pagar el precio de su sangre!».
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Doomscream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Thorbald se oscurece.{/n} «No respetaba demasiado a Opticon-22, pero luchó honorablemente contra Balescream y murió valientemente. Era un guerrero digno. ¡Y quien lo ha matado deberá pagar el precio de su sangre!».
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: {n}Thorbalds Miene verdüstert sich.{/n} "Mein Herz hatte wenig Respekt vor Opticon-22, doch er hat Unheilsschrei mit Ehre bekämpft und ist mit Mut gefallen. Ein würdiger Kämpfer war er. Sein Mörder muss den Blutzoll bezahlen!"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Doomscream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Thorbalds Miene verdüstert sich.{/n} "Mein Herz hatte wenig Respekt vor Opticon-22, doch er hat Unheilsschrei mit Ehre bekämpft und ist mit Mut gefallen. Ein würdiger Kämpfer war er. Sein Mörder muss den Blutzoll bezahlen!"
traits.speaker: RegindSpacewolfMarine_Ranged

languages.text: {n}Thorbald'ın yüzü kararıyor.{/n} "Yalan söylemeyeceğim, Opticon-22'ye pek saygı duymazdım ancak Belanarası'yla yiğitçe savaştı, gözü pek bir şekilde ölümü karşıladı. Kıymetli bir savaşçıydı. Katili, dökülen kanın bedelini ödemeli!"
languages.original_text: {n}Thorbald's expression darkens.{/n} "My heart had little respect for Opticon-22, but he fought Doomscream with honour and fell with courage. A worthy fighter he was. His killer must pay the bloody toll!"
